data.#description: Donation to CARE, Direct Relief, and International Medical Corps. We have reached out to ask for the breakdown by organization.
Grant commitment to humanitarian relief agencies. Does not include employee matching campaign currently underway.

data.#org+name+receiver: Ministry of the Interior Disaster and Emergency Management Presidency (AFAD) [Government]
data.#description: 7 billion Turkish liras donated to the Turkiye One Heart / Türkiye Tek Yürek fundraising campaign organized by AFAD.

TÜRKONFED represents over 60,000 small and medium enterprises in Türkiye. Their members have delivered in-kind donations, critical equipment, and logistical services worth over $11 million to affected areas as of 20 February 2023.
